website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting hipster-styled running underwear will find their match from this reputable brand.
pros: Comes in different colors and designs
Fabric is remarkably stretchy and holds up under any athletic activity
Edges are extremely smooth and can be worn under any outfit
cons: Some buyers wished the underwear offered more skin coverage

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. I thought athletic underwear was for quitters--not true at all. Anyone who exercises needs these. I'm a small in most women's apparel, but I needed a medium in these. So, they fit more like Junior sizes than women's. Super comfy--barely notice they're there. These are also the mesh ones, not the neoprene-like ones. I can't stand the neoprene ones because they don't have enough staying power for curves. These are great for stay-put undies. I will be buying these until the day I die.
customer_reviews.author: Raggie

customer_reviews.title: The New Balance Breathe Hipster Panty worked much better for me-not a single wedgy
customer_reviews.text: These worked to wick the sweat away and keep me dry. However, they didn't cover my but cheeks and I had a wedgy constantly. I might as well have been wearing a thong. The New Balance Breathe Hipster Panty worked much better for me-not a single wedgy!
customer_reviews.author: Puddlestomper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for wearing with running tights!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new pair of running tights that, for some reason, the manufacturer decided didn't need a gusset in the crotch. Hence, things are a little scratchy in that area. The tights are awesome otherwise, so I went on the hunt for a pair of undies to wear with them. These fit perfectly, didn't ride up or over or under, and were so light I didn't notice I was wearing them. Now, my tights are very form-fitting and I only ran three miles...but without them I can tell you three miles were torture so, this was money well spent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of undies ....
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost this review is coming from a guy. I wanted something nice ans airy for a half marathon I was running and I didn't see anything that really caught my eye and these came up when I searched "running underwear" so I decided to give them a shot. They covered everything that needed to b covered while wicking sweat away and allowing air to flow through. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M Neid

customer_reviews.title: but it's not bad once you get past that fact
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect full coverage in the back, but it's not bad once you get past that fact. It doesn't budge with movement and it dries quick. It's not seamless and so will be noticed under something a little snugger. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addicted

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite underwear, hands down. Super comfortable, form fitting, stretchy, fast wicking fabric. I originally bought these for working out, which they are amazing for. They are so amazing that I plan to buy more and replace most of my underwear with these in various colors. I wear a size 4 in pants and got a small, and it fits great. I can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: It'sJess

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've never purchased Under Armour underwear before but ever since I started running, I realized I needed to purchase something for the sweat. I purchased one of the nude in medium and it fit perfectly (I'm usually a medium or small in Victoria Secret underwear). I ran for 4 miles and had no problem with it sticking anywhere it shouldnt ! I actually love this product because it feels very comfortable and works ! I will be purchasing more in different colors soon !
customer_reviews.author: Lizzi

customer_reviews.title: Prone to cause wedgies
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to wear these running. They fit when I was in the house and tried them on but went running and they quickly became a thong. They are lightweight, see through and breathable but that doesn't help if they don't stay put where they are supposed to. Follow up: I reached out to Under Armour, assuming I couldn't return them since I wore them once and they did not perform as expected. They could not accept a return or offer other options. Do not purchase unless you are sure they will work for you or you are willing to risk the buy and be stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, don't grip the body.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Won't wear again. I am searching for something to wear under some white running tights and thought I would try these, but I was disappointed. I am a US women's size 10 with an athletic/curvy build and run 3 or 4 times a week. Perhaps I should have ordered a sz medium instead of large. They just didn't grip my curves at all. I think a lot of women like them though, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The quality you expect isn't there!
customer_reviews.text: These run smaller than what you would normally wear and they are way to thin. Without being too graphic they snag if you shave or have short trimmed landscaping. OUCH! I am not happy with these at all and do not recommend them if you want comfort in any situation. Give a thumbs up if you found my review helpful! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: These are so thin that I thought they wouldn't last very long, but they've been through several washes and they've held up. I love the "barely-there" feel. Amazing and true to size (they seem small when you take them out of the packaging, but they stretch).
customer_reviews.author: squirks

customer_reviews.title: I'm not an underwear person while running and yet I like these
customer_reviews.text: I have always run without anything below my tights or shorts and these feel like its still the case. They are very sheer and almost non-existent. Cute too, with all the sheerness going on. These are so tissue-paper-like that I wonder how long they will last, but for now, I'm getting a couple more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they’re worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Lots complain that these go up your bum, but I wear them lower on my hips and don’t have any problems. I dislike thongs, so these are a seamless alternative. Very thin. Crotch is of same material as the “body”, meaning it isn’t cotton and it is thin. Are wearing well. I do not put them through the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: OK, I legit never write reviews. I think this is my first - EVER. But I feel compelled to say - these are the bomb. The real deal. They don't bunch. They don't ride. They don't give you a wedgie. They didn't get wet when I worked out in them. I want to buy a truckload and throw at all my other underwear. These are, by far, the best underwear I've ever bought. Under Armour: take my money. Mic drop, I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: KHL

customer_reviews.title: Skip these unless you like wedgies
customer_reviews.text: These feel like pantyhose & were comfy at first, but after a few washes I keep a wedgie constantly & the waist rolls down too. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: trippind27

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin but okay for quick exercise. I bought these looking for good moisture-wicking undies for backpacking as they are very delicate. Im 5'7 and 110lbs and the XS fits.
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Super lightweight and soft mesh, with thin and gentle elastic. They are breathable, nearly invisible even under leggings, and don't ride up. They are a bit "cheekier" than I prefer, but they still seem like they will be comfortable and stay put for intense exercise.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this. I bought them because I started training ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I bought them because I started training for a 1/2 marathon and wanted something light. While they are super light and the material feels nice. After the first mile they ride up... very disappointed but I may try them with jeans and see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pana

customer_reviews.title: Bunches up. Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to wear while running. I run long distances sometimes and have had issues with chafing with regular unders. I did buy them to size and they fit well when I put them on and were quite comfy. About .25 miles down the road and they bunched up into uncomfortable areas.. ehhheemmm needless to say that these did not fit my expectations as a pare of sports underwear to use while running or any kind of action sport. was a very uncomfortable Half Marathon.. very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for running and hiking
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them to wear during a rock-n-roll race and they were perfect. I’m going to buy a few more in preparation for a multi-day home in Argentina.
customer_reviews.author: KJC1

customer_reviews.title: They help when wearing workout clothes but could be improved in small ways
customer_reviews.text: These fit a tad bigger than I expected. They're like a light weight mesh material. I don't know if it's because they were slightly to big but they'r not as form fitting or stick to you as I expected. They do slide and bunch up a bit and I notice them a little under my clothes. They do breath well and are a lot better compared to other garments for working out.
customer_reviews.author: sam mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge underarmor fan most comfortable cloth I have bought so I when I saw these I knew my wife would love them she likes the fact that it is comfortable not binding and almost feels like she's not wearing anything at all
customer_reviews.author: JDUB

customer_reviews.title: Wicking 3-1/2 stars...size isn't uniformed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pairs (L) One fit somwhat too large. The other fit perfectly. However because they're not uniformed in size I won't likely purchase them again. FYI I wear a (L) in Gap brand undies. I give them 3-1/2 stars for wicking. Definitely notice a difference from my regular undies.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: You need a pair of these!!
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are MAGICAL. I bought these for working out in and let me tell you, I wear them all the time now. Working out or not. They don't show any panty lines in my leggings or yoga pants! They are so comfortable and so thin you don't even feel like they are there! Seriously, everyone needs a pair of these magical panties!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Best sports brief
customer_reviews.text: Loved these, could not feel them, and so comfortable. I ran a 10K and a Half Marathon in these and didn't get elastic marks as I do with my other brands. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzuka

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy perfectness!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! My favorite! They fit amazing, stretch in every way & don’t dig in! I wonder if they have a swimsuit made out of the same material but thicker?! I’ve bought 4 pair & will continue as needed. 💜
customer_reviews.author: S. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: These panties were comfortable but did not hold up over time thru the laundry. Would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these underwear
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these underwear. Sooo comfortable. I would not have bought them for this price if I hadn’t had an amazon gift card. I usually try to find these on sale. At this price, not on sale at all.
customer_reviews.author: julia lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable! Stretchy and soft. Only complaint is that it might move around with alot of movement and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Rupster

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy !
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for nice comfortable with reasonable price undewear, this one is very comfy, just price is higher, if price is under $7/pcs , i would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: Moisture wicking and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic underwear - sexy too! Who knew moisture wicking underwear could be so all around wonderful? Fit great - even better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for running!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for half marathon training. They are really moisture wicking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered these in a medium (5'6/110 pounds) because these run a little small and I got a lot of wedgies! They are super light weight and fold down to nothing which is great - way less bulky than similar moisture-wicking underwear! I just bought another pair in a medium!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Better than Victoria Secret
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite underwear! This brand last forever and are better than Victoria Secret!
customer_reviews.author: N. Groom

customer_reviews.title: Best panties ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This underwear is truly as great as advertised. Fits better than expected. Soft and especially light. Washes easily in cold water, no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: Julie YB

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my girlfriend who is a yoga and gym enthusiast. They look great on her and she loves how comfortable they are and how they stay in place when she works out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for runners!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and wish I had bought them years ago! I’m a runner who runs between 3-5 miles 4-5 days a week and no wedgies!!! They fit true to size of normal underwear!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light, and quick drying! Will be buying more. I usually wear a size 0 or 2 petite and the xs fit great, very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: im wearing underwear?
customer_reviews.text: Barely feel like you have anything on! super comfortable! i use these when i work out during my lunch at work since i felt so gross sitting in sweaty underwear all day after I worked out. These are great! true to size.
customer_reviews.author: d03

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  Order a Size Down.
customer_reviews.text: I love these but order down a size like the other reviewers say. I am 5'9'' and 140lbs, usually wear medium underwear but the small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey towle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but thin
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy by really thin and see through. Wasn’t expecting the thin see through part which is why I am giving it a 4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Super Comfortable and Breathable. Great for gym or lounging or every day
customer_reviews.author: dgberk

customer_reviews.title: Could do with a bit more coverage in the rear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for workouts and they work pretty well. I could do with a bit more coverage in the rear, but I am "blessed" in that area. Most people would do just fine. Lightweight and breathable, I bought two pair and i would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: but quickly grew to like them. Fit and comfort I'm told were great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for my wife when she works out. She was a little skeptical about them at first, but quickly grew to like them. Fit and comfort I'm told were great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. KK

customer_reviews.title: I am an exofficio brand brat but these worked wonders ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an exofficio brand brat but these worked wonders for me so far during hiking, climbing and 14 days in Africa without access to cleaning facilities
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elsbury

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Unwearable. Terrible fit. Rides up.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Back rides up ie wedgy. I read that some women complained about it riding up. It's not a size thing. The underwear is poorly designed. Total waste of $. Learn from my mistake. I usually don't do a review but felt I needed to this time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: These underwear fit well. They are thin material and high quality which allows for maximum breathability.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for runners. I never have to tug at them and they dry so fast when you are exercising or running, love them!
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations! Fabric too thin...If your butt is not tiny, it could be uncomfortable and bunching into/ behind the scene ;-P
customer_reviews.author: Pear25

customer_reviews.title: Pink color runs
customer_reviews.text: The color bled! I love how they fit and how quickly they dry, but the color runs still. I have to wash them separately.
customer_reviews.author: southern belle

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for this underwear everywhere, so glad I found it on amazon. Its the most comfy breathable underwear to workout in.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Soft and light, but they do not stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Sims

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are amazing. So comfortable and perfect for the summer and workouts. Sweat wicking and dry fast. I get XL and I'm size 16.
customer_reviews.author: nerdreviews2017

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these... they would have 5 stars if they didn't move so much in regular clothing. When I wear workout clothing- they stay put and keep me dry. When I wore them in my uniform they kept me dry but OH MY they moved a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Symone Kolagbodi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. Cheaply made, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely comfortable, especially light and airy in hot humid climate of south Florida
customer_reviews.author: Clay Gate

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap napkins are thicker than these. I hold them up and I can see way more light through them than I should. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lunahbella

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very hot humid climate. These are the coolest undies I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mul

customer_reviews.title: Best panties ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best women’s panties... for athletics and everyday!!! Perfect for spin class!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I’m so disappointed. These aren’t cheap and I’ve worn them twice ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. These aren’t cheap and I’ve worn them twice and they have 4 holes in them! Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby P

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Super comfy and soft material. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: B O O M E R

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fits comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Fit just as expected and it was comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable and very light weight
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely comfortable and very light weight. I like to hand-wash and they are often dry by the next morning. Great for workouts and travel,
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable underwear I own. Love the stretch and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good material. Maybe a size larger would have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay put...tends to roll down under gym tights. Good material . Maybe a size larger would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Titanium601

customer_reviews.title: Flat/no butts only
customer_reviews.text: No idea how the large is supposed to cover your butt cheeks. The hip to tush ratio is way off. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for something thin and light, this is perfect. I was looking for something to absorb sweat and wick away moisture & this does not do that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect for guys
customer_reviews.text: I prefer wearing womens underwear for runs and this fits perfectly for me. A very flattering cut as well, no problems here. The sheer look also allows for cooler runs.
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Soft, stretchy, and comfortable, but I honestly can't tell that they wick moisture any better than regular underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Woo

customer_reviews.title: Stayed cool and breezy and stayed hidden very well under tight ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these today at the gym and was really impressed. Stayed cool and breezy and stayed hidden very well under tight yoga pants. I will reorder
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Wear well and wash well. Do their job when playing golf in Texas heat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teeny tiny box is entertaining for all.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the household got a kick out of the teeny tiny box these came in. Very comfy, true to size, good for every day wear even.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: more comfortable, and no panty lines
customer_reviews.text: Totally had panty lines... AND had to deal with panty creep... Asics thongs are cheaper, more comfortable, and no panty lines. I wore my asics in a super spartan and they were very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable. Almost feel like you aren’t wearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved them. She says they are very comfortable and soft and barely feel like she has any on.
customer_reviews.author: Oscars Herrera

customer_reviews.title: These chones were incredibly comfortable and stayed in place while snowboarding for 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: These chones were incredibly comfortable and stayed in place while snowboarding for 6 hours! Will purchase more to test out during hikes and workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I am ordering more. The perfect light weight and moisture-wicking running underwear. But also attractive and comfortable enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But they fit really nicely and were really comfy
customer_reviews.text: When I got these out of the packet I thought I must have bought a child's size, they looked so small! But they fit really nicely and were really comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah robinson-schofield

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable underwear ever! Great for working out or everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Serious PL and no little coverage
customer_reviews.text: Serious panty lines and not much coverage in the back. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not seamless, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. They aren't seamless so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: A.Morrow

customer_reviews.title: comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: wow!! Not usually a fan of undies, but these are super comfy!! Buying some more :)
customer_reviews.author: vegasrn27

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable but ride up when I exercise
customer_reviews.text: Soft, lightweight and comfortable but ride up when I exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. The only reason she got them was because of working out.
customer_reviews.author: jason watson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Not as "full-coverage" in the back as I would hope, but they are very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Derenski

customer_reviews.title: Imádom! Az első ilyen márkájú alsóneműm, de biztosan ...
customer_reviews.text: Imádom ! Az első ilyen márkájú alsóneműm ,de biztosan nem az utolsó.
customer_reviews.author: Hanga Kincsvero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but they are not raw edge.
customer_reviews.author: Ddz

customer_reviews.title: Wedgies
customer_reviews.text: So, at first - I loved these... in winter when I was just working out indoors, not moving the legs too much. Well, it finally got warm out, & I tried them for running and just, no. These just suck right into your butt crack - it's soooooo bad. I've never had anything behave this way. Maybe I need a smaller size (though they feel like they fit fine)... I don't know, but just no thanks. So: great for sweaty activities that aren't running or jogging. They're super-comfy otherwise and you can't see them through yoga/tight bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Raetsel

customer_reviews.title: UA is a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, breathable and affordable. My go-to for running. I plan to order more when the are back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and breathable. I love them for hot summers and gym time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much that I bought five pairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much that I bought five pairs. There are some mild VPL, but they're absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Too stretchy and not supportive at all. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are super soft. I wear them to the gym and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft. I wear them to the gym and love them. They are long too, which I like because they give more coverage and don't ride up. They are true to size and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, super comfy. No riding up and feels like no undies on at all!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love. These are very comfortable and breath like a dream so they're great for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: RKoll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The fit is great and they are so lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Workout a lot and they fit perfect like they are not even there!
customer_reviews.author: Sara E.

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these & plan on stocking up because good underwear is hard for me to find. They are super soft and it doesn't even feel like you have anything on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: These are not small, they are for a child. I was given these as a gift, and they are clearly defective/mistake.
customer_reviews.author: towanda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at but useless for me to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These panties look pretty but I did not care for the lack of coverage nor the ride-up in the backside.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ottum

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Power
product_meta.description:
UA Power In Pink is donating $10 million to Johns Hopkins Kimmel Cancer Center to benefit breast health, innovation & education .Updated alpha sizing! .New super-soft stretch fabric delivers excellent all-day comfort for any activity .Laser cut edges offer a hem-free construction for a smoother, more flattering silhouette .4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction .Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes .Fuller back for the perfect amount of coverage .Soft cotton gusset .Tagless construction .




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :3.9 x 3.8 x 0.6 inches; 1 Ounces
 * Item model number :1276493
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :December 29, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Under Armour Apparel
